about_the_game:
This gameplay is a visual novel game developed according to the comic with the same name "Become Castellane in Another World", which had been widely published on online comic websites worldwidely since 2019 . The gameplay highly recovers the original adventure story of the male protagonist in a different world, and further enriches different plot branch options, making the entire otherworld adventure full of fun. Fun and cheerful.
When a gamer turns on the time travel buff, of course he chooses to cause trouble! Make trouble! Make trouble! The royal sister has cat ears, the loli fox ears, the soft girl has rabbit ears... This is not a zoo! This is a strange world where the jungle is strong but the strong eats it! A real strategic game, a huge conspiracy crisis, the overlord of another world is loading, you are all scum...
Description of General Mature Content
"Become the Castellane in Another World" is a visual novel gameplay adapted from the comic book of the same name, in which there are many orc female characters. Some of the characters may be dressed in sexy or revealing clothes, exuding a youthful atmosphere. During the protagonist's adventure, there will also be violent scenes such as fighting and bloodshed.

name: Become Castellane in Another World

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit)
  • Processor: The 4th generation Intel® Core™ processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: This gameplay is a virsual novel game developed according to the anime with same name of "Become Castellane in Another World", which enclude enriched plot branch options to provide more funs during the jouney in another world by following the key role, to enjoy the journey with funs and happiness.
